title: Civil Services (Qualification for appointment as High Court Judge) Act, 1965
title_en: Civil Services (Qualification for appointment as High Court Judge) Act, 1965
description: Official consolidated text of Civil Services (Qualification for appointment as High Court Judge) Act, 1965 (XXI of 1965) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title and commencement
provisions.content:
(1). This Act may be called the Civil Services
(Qualification for Appointment as High Court Judge) Act, 1965.
(2) It shall come into force at once.

provisions.title: Section 2. 2[Certain Groups of APUG] to be civil service for purposes of 3[Article 193] (2) (b) of
provisions.content:
the Constitution. The 4[Secretariat Group and District Management Group of the All-Pakistan
Unified Grades, and the successors of the said Groups from time to time,] shall be a Civil Service for
the purposes of paragraph (b) of clause (2) of 3[article 193] of the constitution.
1
For Statement of Objects and Reasons, see Gaz. of P., 1965, Ext., p.1348.
2
Subs. by the Civil Services (Qualification for Appointment as High Court Judge) (Amdt.) Act 1988 (I of 1988), s.2 for “CSP”.
3
Subs. by F.A.O. 1975, Art.2 and Sch. for “Article 92”.
4
Subs. by Act 1 of 1988, s. 2, for “Civil Service of Pakistan”.
